text:
This is a placeholder random basic weakness.

You can replace it with a specific weakness manually or use the randomize button to replace it with a random weakness from your collection.

deck_options.name: Versatile
deck_options.error: Too many off-class cards for Versatile.
Deck must have at least 10 skill cards.
You cannot have assets that take up an ally slot.

back_flavor: Lola had assumed that her days of performing The King in Yellow were behind her. Recently, however, she has heard a lone violin play the haunting melody from the show's last production. The music creeps into her mind in moments of silence and solitude, and she's compelled to visit the Ward Theatre one last time.
back_text: Deck size: 40. Class Choices: At deck creation, choose 2 classes ([guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], or [survivor]). Deckbuilding Options: Neutral cards level 0-5, cards from your chosen classes level 0-4, cards from other classes level 0-1. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 2 copies of Improvisation, 2 copies of Crisis of Identity, 1 random basic weakness. Additional Requirements: Your deck must include at least 6 cards from each class ([guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], and [survivor]).

deck_options.error: You must have at least 6 cards from each faction.

name: Lola Hayes
text: You begin the game in the Neutral role. You can only play or commit Neutral cards or cards of your current role. Forced - When your turn begins: Switch your role ([guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], [survivor], or Neutral). [elder_sign] effect: +2. You may switch roles.

name: Leading Lady (Heroine)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Guardian ([guardian]) card, you may either draw 1 card or immediately take a fight action.

flavor: "I've learned a thing or two on stage."
name: Leading Lady (Mentor)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Seeker ([seeker]) card, you may either draw 1 card or immediately take an investigate action.

name: Leading Lady (Femme Fatale)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Rogue ([rogue]) card, you may either draw 1 card or immediately take an evade action.

flavor: "The trick is to only show them what you want them to see."
name: Leading Lady (Enchantress)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Mystic ([mystic]) card, you may either draw 1 card or remove 1 doom from a player card at your location.

flavor: "Come on, Lola, just make it to the final bow."
name: Leading Lady (Final Girl)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Survivor ([survivor]) card, you may either draw 1 card or heal 1 damage/horror.

name: Samuel Blake
text:
Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Peril. Hidden.
While Samuel Blake is in your hand, you cannot switch roles or play cards belonging to another role.
While Samuel Blake is in play, as an additional cost for you to switch your role, you must take 1 horror.

flavor: "I'm not here to help you shop; I'm here to keep you alive."
name: Bodyguard
text:
Bodyguard may be assigned damage dealt to other investigators at your location.
[reaction] When Bodyguard is defeated: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

flavor: "I've taken every class that Dr. Christopher offers!"
name: Dorothy Simmons
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you successfully investigate by exactly 1 or 3, exhaust Dorothy Simmons: Gain 1 resource.

name: Fingerprint Kit
text: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Exhaust Fingerprint Kit and spend 1 supply: Investigate ([intellect]). You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at your location.

flavor: "I could swear we've been here before..."
name: Local Map
text: Uses (4 secrets). [action] Spend 1 secret: Investigate ([intellect]). Investigate a revealed connecting location. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed, you may exhaust Local Map to move to that location.

flavor: A lens into a world unseen can reveal things you wish it hadn't.
name: Magnifying Glass
text:
Fast.
You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.

name: Sharp Rhetoric
text:
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test (+2 [intellect] instead if this is an investigation or parley).
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test (+2 [willpower] instead if this is an investigation or parley).

flavor: You learn so much more by getting up-close and personal.
name: Gather Intel
text:
Fast. Play when an enemy enters your location.
Draw 2 cards.

name: M1903 Hammerless
text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight ([agility]). If the targeted enemy is exhausted, this attack deals +1 damage.

flavor: "I suppose I'll help you... for now."
name: Olivier Bishop
text:
You get +1 [agility].
[fast] During your turn, exhaust Olivier Bishop: Move to a connecting location.

flavor: "To be createde of 3 partes aether, 2 cinnabar, and at least 3 pounds ophe rokket gatherede from ain hevenful mountain." -Alchemical Formula No VIII ca. 1660
name: Cloak of Resonance
text: [reaction] When horror is placed on Cloak of Resonance, exhaust it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Cosmic Flame
text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Fight ([willpower]). If you succeed, you may spend 1 charge to deal +1 damage for this attack. If you reveal a [skull] token during this test, remove 1 charge from Cosmic Flame (if you cannot, take 1 damage and discard this card).

name: Ward of Protection
text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery card.
Cancel that card's revelation effect. Then, take 1 horror.

name: Aleksey Saburov
text: [reaction] When your turn begins: Heal 1 damage or 1 horror from Aleksey Saburov.

name: Hunter's Instinct
text:
Limit 1 per investigator. Uses (3 supplies). If there are no supplies on Hunter's Instinct, discard it.
[reaction] After you engage an enemy, spend 1 supply and exhaust Hunter's Instinct: Add a level 0 event in your discard pile to your hand.

flavor: You can never be too prepared.
name: Emergency Cache
text: Gain 3 resources.

name: The Gold Bug
text: Revelation - Put The Gold Bug into play in your threat area. It cannot leave play except by the [action] ability below. You get -1 health and -1 sanity. [action]: Shuffle the Gold Bug into your deck.
